thankyou.subject: Thank you!
thankyou.text: Our Community Building base app is designed to get developers started with user authenticated multiplayer applications.
thankyou.html:
Community Building

Making a Better World

Thank you for taking the first step towards designing a new and better world. This base application can be used for IoT, Multiplayer Games, E-Commerce, Collaborative Forums, and more. Please share your development journey with me as you continue with your project!

Sincerely, Eric Eisaman
